title: kira_is_back
author: kira_is_back
content: facebook page, tik tok business manager or twitter promote post

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: kira_is_back on August 25, 2023, 04:12:37 AMfacebook page, tik tok business manager or twitter promote postI am very curious to know what is the problem of ou creating such an account for free. And also what is the benefit of buying this type of account when you are not able to add the account on the account as the name of you and the person from whom you will buy the account will not be the same name?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on August 29, 2023, 09:31:47 PMI am very curious to know what is the problem of ou creating such an account for free. And also what is the benefit of buying this type of account when you are not able to add the account on the account as the name of you and the person from whom you will buy the account will not be the same name?I'm pretty sure this is an alt account from a well-known troll i_am_viral Wrote about here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5094661.msg62739452#msg62739452Earlier he tried (at least that's what he wrote here) to manipulate the advertising system on Facebook. I wouldn't take him seriously, although he probably deserves to be nuked due to ban evasion.
